SEARCH
Package com.cloudhopper.mc.runtime

Schnittstelle HandlerContext

public interface HandlerContext
Provides runtime information about the current function invocation.

This context is passed to every CloudRequestHandler and includes platform-specific metadata such as request ID, function name, and resource limits. Implementations of this interface are provided by the platform adapter (e.g., AWS Lambda or Azure Functions).

  • Methodendetails

    • getRequestId

      String getRequestId()
      Gibt zurück:
      the unique ID of the current request

    • getFunctionName

      String getFunctionName()
      Gibt zurück:
      the name of the deployed function

    • getFunctionVersion

      String getFunctionVersion()
      Gibt zurück:
      the version of the function

    • getInvokedFunctionArn

      String getInvokedFunctionArn()
      Gibt zurück:
      the fully qualified ARN (or platform-specific equivalent) of the invoked function

    • getLogGroupName

      String getLogGroupName()
      Gibt zurück:
      the name of the log group for this function

    • getLogStreamName

      String getLogStreamName()
      Gibt zurück:
      the name of the log stream associated with this invocation

    • getRemainingTimeInMillis

      long getRemainingTimeInMillis()
      Gibt zurück:
      the remaining time available to the function in milliseconds

    • getMemoryLimitInMB

      int getMemoryLimitInMB()
      Gibt zurück:
      the memory limit for the function in megabytes
